isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - AIR SYSTEM - INSTALL

step1.para: Install the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (G) between the slave valve and the direct range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder.
Install the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (F) between the slave valve and the low range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder.
Install the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (E) between the slave valve and the air filter/regulator assembly.
Install the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (D) between the intermediate shift cylinder and the air filter/regulator assembly.
Install the black 1/8 inch O.D. signal line (C) between the intermediate shift cylinder and the "F" port of the selector valve.
Install the black 1/8 inch O.D. signal line (B) between the slave valve and the "R" port of the selector valve.
Install the white 1/8 inch O.D. supply line (A) between the slave valve and the "S" port of the selector valve.
